biography: Born in 1967 in USA, after studying theater at the University of Colorado, he worked first in many theater projects, and then went on to work in many films and TV series, for example Friends (1994), the action film Perfect Target (1997) with Daniel Bernhardt and Brian Thompson, the fantasy film Ring of Steel (1994) and the Tv series Valley of the Dolls (1994). Pirri still works on many films and TV series.
name: Jim Pirri
